title: Care of the newborn baby
creator_credit: John A. Haeseler, United States. Dept. of Education and Willard Pictures
brief_description: Instructs parents in the care, feeding, and bathing of a newborn baby, introducing the prenatal clinic where instruction is given to expectant mothers, the hospital or nursing home, and the district nurse who visits the mother after the baby is born.
creator_credit_for_label: John A. Haeseler, United States. Dept. of Education and Willard Pictures
